## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm really interested in the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, as well as the Verus Vault feature. Can you tell me more about the key features and benefits of these, and how Verus Vault enhances the security of funds on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain, enabling peer-to-peer transactions without intermediaries. This marketplace provides a transparent and auditable way to execute transactions, allowing users to advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT. Users can pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, and accept payment to either, ensuring a high level of privacy and security.

One of the key benefits of the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is its ability to enable owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. This creates new opportunities for creators and organizations to monetize their digital assets in a decentralized and transparent way.

Regarding Verus Vault, it's an additional security feature that enhances the protection of funds on a VerusID. When enabled, Verus Vault locks the VerusID, preventing any spending of funds from that identity until it is unlocked. However, users can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn rewards while the funds are locked. Additionally, users can still receive funds while the VerusID is locked. To enable Verus Vault, users must have at least one primary identity and one revocation/recovery ID configured.

Overall, the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, combined with Verus Vault, provides a powerful and secure way to manage digital identities and assets, enabling users to take control of their digital ownership and monetize their assets in a decentralized and transparent way.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
